channel.title: Surface Tension: Mortar screen glitch while fighting Gargantua!
channel.description: The screen on the air strike / mortar screen on top of the silo or whatever doesn't seem to function properly: there is a crosshair that stays stuck on the screen and a glitchy one that I have control of, and can aim with the red dot, but it's flashing in and out in a manner not consistent with the quality of an intentional effect and I can't get the mortar to actually fire and kill the Garg, so I'm just stuck and cannot advance in the level. Any help?

item.title: Surface Tension: Mortar screen glitch while fighting Gargantua!
item.dc:creator: The_MAZZTer
item.description:
Yeah it’s a bit glitchy for me too and doesn’t quite render right. But if you aim with your crosshair to where you want to fire, click it, then click “fire” (I think you use the use key, if that doesn’t work use fire) it’ll work.
